verses.verse: The people <S%H5971><s%> were complaining <S%H596><s%> in the ears <S%H7451><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H639><s%> his anger was kindled; <S%H2734><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s fire <S%H784><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them, <S%H398><s%> and consumed some of the outskirts <S%H7097><s%> of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
The people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> abated. <S%H8257><s%>
The <S%H1931><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Taberah, <S%H8404><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s fire <S%H784><s%> burnt among them. <S%H1197><s%>

The mixed multitude <S%H628><s%> that was among <S%H7130><s%> them lusted <S%H183><s%> exceedingly: <S%H1121><s%> and the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also wept <S%H1058><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Who will give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%>

We remember <S%H2142><s%> the fish, <S%H1710><s%> which we ate <S%H398><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for nothing; <S%H2600><s%> the cucumbers, <S%H7180><s%> and the melons, <S%H20><s%> and the leeks, <S%H2682><s%> and the onions, <S%H1211><s%> and the garlic; <S%H7762><s%>
but now we <S%H5315><s%> have lost our appetite. <S%H3002><s%> There is nothing at all except <S%H1115><s%> this manna <S%H4478><s%> to look at. <S%H5869><s%>"
The manna <S%H4478><s%> was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and its appearance <S%H5869><s%> like the appearance <S%H5869><s%> of bdellium. <S%H916><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> went around, <S%H7751><s%> gathered <S%H3950><s%> it, <S%H2912><s%> and ground it in mills, <S%H7347><s%> or beat <S%H1743><s%> it in mortars, <S%H4085><s%> and boiled <S%H1310><s%> it in pots, <S%H6517><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of it. <S%H2940><s%> Its taste was like the taste <S%H2940><s%> of fresh <S%H3955><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
When the dew <S%H2919><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> on the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> fell on it. <S%H3381><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of his tent; <S%H168><s%> and the anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was displeased. <S%H7489><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Why have you treated with your servant <S%H5650><s%> so badly? <S%H7489><s%> Why haven't <S%H4672><s%> I found favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> that you lay <S%H7760><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of all this people on me? <S%H5971><s%>

Have I conceived <S%H2029><s%> all this people? <S%H5971><s%> Have I brought them forth, <S%H3205><s%> that you should tell <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H5375><s%> 'Carry them in your bosom, <S%H2436><s%> as a nurse <S%H539><s%> carries <S%H5375><s%> a nursing infant, <S%H3243><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> which you swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers? <S%H1><s%>'

Where <S%H370><s%> could I get meat <S%H1320><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to all this people? <S%H5971><s%> For they weep <S%H1058><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'Give us meat, <S%H1320><s%> that we may eat. <S%H398><s%>'
I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> because it is too heavy for me. <S%H3515><s%>

If you treat <S%H6213><s%> me this way, <S%H2026><s%> please kill me right now, <S%H2026><s%> if I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight; <S%H5869><s%> and don't <S%H7200><s%> let me see my wretchedness. <S%H7451><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Gather <S%H622><s%> to me seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom you know <S%H3045><s%> to be the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> over them; <S%H3947><s%> and bring them to the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> that they may stand there with you. <S%H3320><s%>

I will come down <S%H3381><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> with you there. <S%H680><s%> I will take of the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> which is on you, <S%H7760><s%> and will put it on them; <S%H5375><s%> and they shall bear the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with you, <S%H5375><s%> that you not bear it yourself alone.

"Say <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> <S%H6942><s%> 'Sanctify yourselves against tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> and you will eat <S%H398><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> for you have wept <S%H1058><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Who will give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%> For it was well <S%H2895><s%> with us in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>" Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and you will eat. <S%H398><s%>

You will not eat <S%H398><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> nor two days, <S%H3117><s%> nor five <S%H2568><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> neither ten <S%H6235><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> nor twenty <S%H6242><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>

but a whole month, <S%H2320><s%> until it come out <S%H3318><s%> at your nostrils, <S%H639><s%> and it is loathsome <S%H2214><s%> to you; <S%H3282><s%> because that you have rejected <S%H3988><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who is among <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H1058><s%> and have wept before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Why did we come out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>"'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The people, <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom I am, <S%H8337><s%> are six hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H7273><s%> on foot; <S%H559><s%> and you have said, <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give them flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>'

Shall flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> be slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> for them, <S%H4672><s%> to be sufficient for them? <S%H1709><s%> Shall all the fish of the sea <S%H3220><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%> for them, <S%H4672><s%> to be sufficient for them?"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> grown short? <S%H7114><s%> Now you will see <S%H7200><s%> whether my word <S%H1697><s%> will happen to you or not. <S%H7136><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he gathered <S%H622><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> them around <S%H5439><s%> the Tent. <S%H168><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, <S%H680><s%> and took of the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> that was on him, <S%H5414><s%> and put it on the seventy <S%H7657><s%> elders: <S%H2205><s%> and it happened that when the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> on them, <S%H5012><s%> they prophesied, but they did so no more. <S%H3254><s%>

But two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%> The name <S%H8034><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> was Eldad, <S%H419><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Medad: <S%H4312><s%> and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> on them; <S%H3789><s%> and they were of those who were written, but had not gone out <S%H3318><s%> to the Tent; <S%H168><s%> and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

A young man <S%H5288><s%> ran, <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H5046><s%> "Eldad <S%H419><s%> and Medad <S%H4312><s%> are prophesying <S%H5012><s%> in the camp! <S%H4264><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H8334><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> one of his chosen men, <S%H979><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "My lord <S%H113><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> forbid them! <S%H3607><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7065><s%> "Are you jealous for my sake? <S%H5414><s%> I wish that all Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s people <S%H5971><s%> were prophets, <S%H5030><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> would put <S%H5414><s%> his Spirit on them! <S%H7307><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H622><s%> into the camp, <S%H4264><s%> he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

A wind <S%H7307><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H5265><s%> and brought <S%H1468><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%> from the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and let them fall <S%H5203><s%> by the camp, <S%H4264><s%> about a day <S%H3117><s%>'s journey <S%H1870><s%> on this side, <S%H3541><s%> and a day <S%H3117><s%>'s journey <S%H1870><s%> on the other side, <S%H3541><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and about two cubits <S%H520><s%> above the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> all that day, <S%H3117><s%> and all the night, <S%H3915><s%> and all the next <S%H4283><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> the quails. <S%H7958><s%> He who gathered least <S%H4591><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> homers; <S%H2563><s%> and they spread <S%H7849><s%> them all abroad <S%H7849><s%> for themselves around <S%H5439><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

While the flesh <S%H1320><s%> was yet <S%H2962><s%> between their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> before it was chewed, <S%H3772><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the people, <S%H5971><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> plague. <S%H4347><s%>
The name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Kibroth <S%H6914><s%> Hattaavah, <S%H6912><s%> because there they buried the people <S%H5971><s%> who lusted. <S%H183><s%>
From Kibroth <S%H6914><s%> Hattaavah the people <S%H5971><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> to Hazeroth; <S%H2698><s%> and they stayed at Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
